archimate:Requirement.name: SM.1.2.1: The organisation's information security policy should be supported by detailed acceptable use policies (AUPs) that define the way in which individuals are expected to use information, systems and endpoint devices within the organisation.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
